Interface ec.id.capabilities.Whereis

Implementing Classes:
WhereisCapability
public abstract interface Whereis
extends Remote
Remote interface defining ability for clients to ask where the owner currently is. The result is expressed in the form of a String.

Author:
Scott B. Lewis, slewis@communities.com

Method Summary
String whereAreYou()
          Method defining basic ability to ask for URL indicating where the capability owner currently is.
 

Method Detail

whereAreYou

public String whereAreYou()
                            throws RemoteException,
                                   NullCapabilityException
Method defining basic ability to ask for URL indicating where the capability owner currently is.
Returns:
String indicating to the caller where the owner currently is. If null, the owner is indicating that they don't wish to say.
Throws:
RemoteException - thrown if some problem with remote call
